tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE healthcare_quality_indicators (
  indicator_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  indicator_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  performance_score FLOAT NOT NULL
)

CREATE TABLE industry_standards (
  standard_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  standard_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  benchmark_score FLOAT NOT NULL
)

CREATE TABLE healthcare_facilities (
  id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  facility_name VARCHAR(255),
  address VARCHAR(255),
  city VARCHAR(100),
  state VARCHAR(50),
  zip_code VARCHAR(10)
)

CREATE TABLE quality_indicators (
  id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  indicator_name VARCHAR(255),
  description TEXT,
  benchmark_value FLOAT
)

CREATE TABLE indicator_performance (
  id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  facility_id INTEGER REFERENCES healthcare_facilities(id),
  indicator_id INTEGER REFERENCES quality_indicators(id),
  performance_score FLOAT,
  date_measured DATE
)

CREATE TABLE Doctor (
	id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
	speciality VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
	hospital_id INT,
	FOREIGN KEY (hospital_id) REFERENCES Hospital(id)
);

CREATE TABLE Patient (
	id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
	age INT,
	doctor_id INT,
	FOREIGN KEY (doctor_id) REFERENCES Doctor(id)
);
